QuestData.Title: How to Become Forsworn
QuestData.Description:
The Forsworn have taken control of Kalliope's Rest and are looting its antiquities. They must be looking for the Spear of Kalliope, a relic of great power.
Their numbers are far too great and we are no match. Perhaps there is another way?
A small group of aspirants is removing artifacts from the shrine. If you gather uniform pieces and an insignia from them, we can get you inside the shrine unnoticed.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: He has the insignia you need to complete your disguise.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 3 Forsworn Uniform Pieces and a Quartermaster's Insignia from within Kalliope's Rest.
